Dutch: adem asem also used in Belgium
pinda  aardnoot, apennoot, grondnoot and olienoot are also sometimes used
Leger des Heils Heilsleger older term
kip hoen, hoender are less common
hoe gaat het? hoe is het?
ziekenhuis, gasthuis hospitaal mostly used in a military context
giraffe kameelpaard and kameelpardel considered archaic
origineel oorspronkelijk used only in relation to the origin or beginning
ananas pijnappel older term, now means "pine cone"
nijlpaard zeekoe older term, now means "sea cow"
mobiele telefoon, mobieltje (Netherlands) GSM (Belgium) cellulair, cell (Suriname)
Gemenebest van Naties  statenbond sometimes used for "confederation"
editie, uitgave uitgaven can also mean "expenditure"

English: filling station, petrol station, service station
